document.title: Deploying Projects
document.paragraph:
This section of the documentation contains information on deploying projects created using EiffelEnvision in Visual Studio .NET. in_this_section
2 In This Section
deploy_requirements.xml Deployment Prerequisites
Lists prerequisites to deploying projects created using EiffelEnvision and deployed using the Visual Studio .NET vbconSetupProjects 0 Setup projects .
deploy_setup.xml Deploying Projects
Instructions on deploying projects created using EiffelEnvision and deploying using the Visual Studio .NET vbconSetupProjects 0 Setup projects .
deploy_no_setup.xml Deploying EiffelEnvision Projects Outside of Visual Studio .NET
Instructions on deploying applications without using the Visual Studio .NET vbconSetupProjects 0 Setup projects .
redistributions.xml Redistributing the Eiffel for .NET Runtime
Information regarding the redistribution of the Eiffel runtime used by applications created in EiffelEnvision.
